body_html:
Hi,
Thank you very much for the response. Sorry for including a long example, I was trying to give exactly the same case as I had.

I've changed to a Windows with GPU environment and the things seems to be running now. Not sure what I've touch because I've done a lot of changes in my code to "clean the things up" and improving the network. I'll try this same code (running) in the Mac Os environment and will give some feedback again. For the moment, I think you can close this issue as is almost sure you are right and the problem was I was doing something wrong. Sorry for the time taken and thanks for the checking.

body:
Hi, 
Thank you very much for the response. Sorry for including a long example, I was trying to give exactly the same case as I had. 

I've changed to a Windows with GPU environment and the things seems to be running now. Not sure what I've touch because I've done a lot of changes in my code to "clean the things up" and improving the network. I'll try this same code (running) in the Mac Os environment and will give some feedback again. For the moment, I think you can close this issue as is almost sure you are right and the problem was I was doing something wrong. Sorry for the time taken and thanks for the checking.
